content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(-22.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine, boiler at position(-24.5, 32.0) and offshore pump at position(-16.5, 26.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(1.5, 1.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Boiler at position(1.5, 1.0) 
-  Boiler at position(1.5, 3.0)

### Copper cable factory
No factory has been set up yet.

### Pipe network at position(1.5, -6.5)
Consists of multiple pipe groups including PipeGroup(fluid_system=259446) and PipeGroup(fluid_system=259456)

### Offshore pump at position(-16.5, 26.5)
Consists of offshore pump and connected pipe group PipeGroup(fluid_system=259494)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it.
- Make sure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place.
- Move closer to the target position if it is too far away.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients and recipes to craft an item.
- Make sure you are not trying to craft a raw resource that must be gathered first.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are compatible and can be connected.
- Check the connection points of the entities to ensure correct connection.
